name: get_weather_history
description: Fetches weather history for a given city using the WeatherAPI. The API is limited to retrieving historical data for up to 7 days in the past.

q.description: Query parameter for location. It could be Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree), location name, postal code, METAR code, IATA code, or IP address.

dt.description: The starting date for historical weather data. Should be on or after 1st Jan, 2010 in yyyy-MM-dd format.

end_dt.description: The ending date for historical weather data. Should be on or after 1st Jan, 2010 and the difference between 'dt' and 'end_dt' should not exceed 30 days.

include_astro.description: Whether to include astronomical data such as sunrise, sunset, moonrise, etc. Default is False.

include_hour_forecast.description: Whether to include hour-by-hour weather history information. Default is False.
